threat: If a user or automated system were tricked into opening a  specially crafted image, a remote attacker could crash the application,  leading to a denial of service, or possibly execute arbitrary code with  user privileges.
If a user or automated system were tricked into  opening a specially crafted BMP image, a remote attacker could crash the  application, leading to a denial of service.
